errorUnexpected: Something unexpected happened. Please try again later.

errors.noPermission: You don't have permission to perform this action
errors.offlineDescription: Please check your internet connection and try again

trialBanner.urgentTitle: ‚ö†Ô∏è Only {{days}} day remaining in your free trial!
trialBanner.urgentTitle_plural: ‚ö†Ô∏è Only {{days}} days remaining in your free trial!
trialBanner.warningTitle: üïê {{days}} days remaining in your free trial
trialBanner.normalTitle: ‚ú® You have {{days}} days left in your free trial
trialBanner.description: Enjoying {{feature}}? Add a payment method to continue using it after your trial ends.

demoBanner.title: üéâ You're in Demo Mode
demoBanner.description: This is a demo venue. Click below to convert to a real venue and start accepting payments.

layout.noVenuesAssignedDesc: It looks like you don't have any venues assigned to your account yet. Please contact your administrator for access.

chat.title: Avoqado Assistant
chat.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?

unsavedChanges.title: Unsaved changes
unsavedChanges.description: You have unsaved changes in your current conversation. What would you like to do?

errors.sendFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again.
errors.clearFailed: Unable to clear history. Please try again.

feedback.correctedDesc: We've recorded your feedback and updated the response.
feedback.unavailableDesc: Cannot provide feedback on cached responses.

dialog.title: Help us improve
dialog.desc: Please describe what was wrong with this response and provide a better answer.

form.label: What was wrong? (Optional: provide a better answer)

nothingToSave.title: Nothing to save
nothingToSave.desc: You need at least one conversation to save it.

alreadyNew.title: Already a new conversation
alreadyNew.desc: You're already in a new conversation.

saved.title: Saved Conversations
saved.emptyDescription: Your saved conversations will appear here. Click the save button to save the current conversation.

clear.title: Clear conversation history?
clear.desc: This will permanently delete your current conversation. This action cannot be undone.

delete.title: Delete conversation?
delete.desc: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

tokenWarning.title: Token Limit Reached
tokenWarning.exhaustedDesc: You've used all your available tokens this month. Sending this message will incur additional charges.
tokenWarning.overageDesc: You're currently in overage. This query will add to your current overage cost of ${{cost}} USD.
tokenWarning.continueQuestion: Do you want to continue anyway?

conversionWizard.title: Convert to Real Venue
conversionWizard.subtitle: Complete the following steps to activate your venue and start accepting real payments.

step2.title: Tax Documents
step2.description: Upload your tax situation certificate and, if applicable, articles of incorporation
step2.uploadLabel: Click to upload or drag and drop

step3.title: Identification
step3.uploadLabel: Click to upload or drag and drop

step4.title: Select Features
step4.description: Choose the features you want to activate
step4.noFeatures: No features available at this time
step4.helpText: Select the features you want to enable for your venue.

step5.title: Review and Confirm
step5.confirmationMessage: By clicking you confirm that the information is correct.

success.title: Conversion Successful!
success.description: Your venue has been successfully converted.

error.title: Error
error.description: There was an error. Please try again.
